title: Keir Starmer – 2023 Comments on Anti-Semitism
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sir Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on social media on 15 February 2023.
content:
Antisemitism is an evil and no political party that cultivates it deserves to hold power.
